title: Welcome to SlotFinder!
welcomeMessage: Welcome to SlotFinder! Thanks for joining our community. We're excited to have you and your friends on board.

steps.inviteParticipants: Invite participants to share their availability
steps.chooseTimeSlot: Choose the perfect time slot for everyone

getStartedMessage: Ready to get started? Click the button below to access your dashboard and create your first event.
footerNote: You're receiving this email because you created an account on SlotFinder.
footerUnsubscribe: If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you can unsubscribe at any time.
